author: Reuters
title: World stocks leap 11% this morning on $2-trillion U.S. stimulus, raising hopes of first back-to-back gains in a month
description: LONDON — A rebound in world stocks reached a lofty 11 per cent on Wednesday and commodities made gains too, as coronavirus-battered markets leapt on news of a US$2 trillion U.S. fiscal stimulus package. Hopes the economic devastation of the global outbreak co…
content:
LONDON — A rebound in world stocks reached a lofty 11 per cent on Wednesday and commodities made gains too, as coronavirus-battered markets leapt on news of a US$2 trillion U.S. fiscal stimulus package.
